titles.title: If Any Man Come After Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If any man come after me, Let him deny himself. Take up his cross, And follow me Unto life eternally; Deny himself, take up his cross, And follow Jesus He is the Way, the Truth, the Life.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am a man, I’ll follow You. I’ll deny myself to follow You. I’ll take my cross and follow You And I will live forever and Ever and ever and ever. For You’re the blessed Lamb Once slain and I will follow You.{/lang-eng}
